name: AIE's Interactive Workshop
description:
AIE's interactive workshop is an interactive experience where hopeful game developers can get a high-level peek into the process of making games!

Guided by a quirky robot mascot, Rami, they can move between game design, game programming and art to make a short 2D platforming level!

Credits:

Lily Rowe- UI Design, UI Art, Programming

James Nelson- Sound Design, Audio Composition

Sophie Pearce- Writing, Narrative Design, Documentation

Kobi Andt- UI Design, Level Design, Team Leader

Blake Hogben- Environment Artist, Prop Artist, Character Artist

Connor Boyd- Environment Artist, Prop Artist, Character Artist

Elijah Potter- Environment Artist, Prop Artist, Character Artist

Callum Golden-  Environment Artist, Prop Artist, Character Artist

Finn O'Grady-  Environment Artist, Prop Artist, Character Artist

Dylan Saurbery-Programmer

Marshall Scholz- Programmer
